page.title: 07HOUSES IN MILTON KEYNES
page.content: Houses in Milton Keynes vary from each estate. The house I live in has four bedrooms and the sort of other rooms you expect to find in a house, Our back garden is quite big, it has a pattio and steps leading onto a path, and another going onto the grass, We also have in our back garden a shed which we made ourselves.Next door to us is a Bungalow, in its back garden gnomes are sitting everywhere you look.The bunglow inside is quite big, with two bedrooms, a kitchen etc.at the end of our bit of road is a house especially made for the disabled. inside theres the main bedroom down stairs which is next to the bathroom, the bathroom is filled with the newest things to help the disabled person. the garden is big with a small pattio and a greenhouse built onto the back door.
